resources.string: Daijish≈ç is a retro launcher that lets you manage your retro games libraries. Daijish≈ç cares about integrated experience, extensibility, aesthetic, and pragmatic usabilities, which let you focus on the games themselves. It will be updated continuously in the future based on user feedback and my own retro gaming experience during my free time. Beware, it does not come with emulators.\n\n"Wat? What does 'Daijish≈ç' even mean?", you ask? "Daijish≈ç" (aka "„Å†„ÅÑ„Åò„Åó„Çá„ÅÜ") actually stands for "Âè∞Â≠óÁ´†" in kanji, which was a pattern widely used in Taiwan during the Japanese period. Anyway, happy gaming.
Sorry to bother you my friend.\nPlease leave an review for Daijish≈ç on Google Play Store if you like it!

The platform with shortname \"%s\" has already existed on your Daijish≈ç. Do you want to replace its platform and players settings from imported platform \"%s\"?\n\n‚ö†Ô∏èBeware some of your settings will be changed.
\"%s\" does not exist on your device. Check it on play store? You can also click \"detect\" to detect available players on your device.
To play this item you have to kill the existing processes. Force killing process might make your current progress unsaved. Are you sure?
This item has empty URI. Please resynchronize.
Playable item and player have different type.

This item no longer exists on URI (%s). 
Please detach and resynchronize.
URI path: %s
URI Authority: %s

This item no longer exists on the analysed file path, 
required by "{file.path}" in "am start" argument. Please detach and resynchronize.
Path: %s
URI: %s
URI path: %s
URI Authority: %s
Do you really want to uninstall \"%s\"?
Total %d playable items in your library.
Last played %s. Played %d times. Use \"%s\" as player.
Please sync items into your library.
Welcome to Daijish≈ç.\nPlease add your platforms first. You can also import selected platforms and players with config generated by \"Pegasus config generator\" on the web browser.
No description. Related item is not attached.
Can\'t find detail for this item with below reason:
üïë Please play an item to display record.
üèÜ Total %d pts, hardcore %d pts, softcore %d pts.
This action will remove items and make you lost some of you records. It might take a while to complete.
Toggle kiosk mode to enter simplified UI mode.
Selected predefined platforms from Daijish≈ç GitHub page.
Switch to continue page whenever an item been played.
Show similar items on detail page.
Disable and override all players \"kill package processes\" warnings.
Scraping box-arts with minimum constraints. Might result in wrong box-arts scraped.
Clear all disjointed items on sync
Clear all playable items that either unlinked or required file not exists when syncing.
Import, download, your players and platforms settings.
Disable all the custom players have set to items.
Clear all playable items that either unlinked or required file not exists.
Remove all items\' preview media from your device. You will need to re-scrape those media.
Update platforms from platforms index uri on startup.
Import platform from generated JSON file.
Import favorited items from generate JSON file.
Import generated config from \"Pegasus config generator\".
Add a player to play you collections.
Add a platform to create collections.
View, edit or delete your players.
View, edit or delete your platforms.
This item has already been selected.
This item has already been added.
Download and apply wallpapers pack from Daijish≈ç GitHub page.
Enable pure dark theme on device using OLED etc.
Enforcing aspect ratio in the platforms page with wallpapers.
Pick a color for a platform automatically based on its wallpaper.
Prettify titles by removing unnecessary strings.
Swap A and B buttons on footer to match your aesthetic.
Showing recent indicators in list view.
Showing genres in platform\'s grid view.
Toggle widgets page based on you like it or not.
Toggle apps page based on you like it or not.
Set your preference select button sound.
Set your preference back button sound.
Disable B-button sound for avoiding repeating button sounds.
Set your home page to be navigated when home button clicked.
Setup your tabs hotkeys. Let you switch left and right with ease.
Setup your switching hotkeys. Let you switch previous and next items like platforms with ease.
Set up your search, tabs, switching and more hotkeys.
Allow Daijish≈ç to be exited by pressing back button.
Buy me a cup of coffee to support my works.
Join discord server to ask questions or sharing your setup.
View readme, report issues or submit suggestions on GitHub.
This pack has default wallpaper included.
This pack does not come with default wallpaper.
This action will replace all of you existing wallpapers.
Specify your index.json URI to download your platforms.
Specify your RSS url to get latest news.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"? Your items and records will be gone.
Do you also want to delete unused players associated with platform \"%s\"?
Search additional player to be added
Search scraper source to be added
Your regex format must start with \"^\" and end with \"$\".
Import preview media from external sources like \"Skraper\".
Import .dat file from external sources like \"Skraper\".
Import XML file from external sources like \"Skraper\". (Emulation Station)
Delete this item will also remove associated records.
Detach URI (unlink file) of this item will need you to resynchronize the file with same md5 hash.
Please enter a playable item name.
Use \"{file.path}\" and \"{file.uri}\" to specify the file to be played.
Regex group 1 will be used as keyword for scraper engines. Try https://regex101.com/.
Kill package processes before am start
Your launcher arguments are not valid.
Press the key twice to register.
Do you want to keep records?
If you choose to keep records, your items will persist. And will relink if items available again.
Delete this URI will also remove associated items and data.
Inspect your items filtered by genres, recent, favorite and newly added.
Pin an item, play by clicking.
Please play at least one item
Items been played in the period
Items been viewed in the period
Library restored. Please re-add you sync paths for each platforms.
Your Daijish≈ç have been upgraded and it is recommended to sync entirely to enable the latest features. Do you want to sync your entire library?
If you regret it. Sync entirely option is in your library settings page.
Select a backup (Long click to remove)
Are you sure your want to delete this backup?
Wallpapers, theme colours, pages and more.
Click to view logs of the app.
Update platforms, synchronize library, backup settings and more in one click depended on your settings.
Remove all playable items flagged as newly added in your library.
Update platforms from platforms index uri on startup and sync.
Inspect invisible playable items in your library.
Merge playable items with similar titles.
Always show sync icon on top bar. Let you manage synchronization not matter when.
Do not scrape preview media. In case you\'ve prepared your own media.
Set wallpaper for all available pages.
Scale your Daijish≈ç UI to fit better on your screen.
Display shortname in platforms page\'s subtitle.
Set your preferred view mode for platforms page.
Download and apply thumbnails pack from Daijish≈ç GitHub page.
Click to setup your Google Drive account.
Daijish≈ç will backup automatically based on criteria.
Select a backup to restore for this device.
Are you sure you want to sign out your account? Your Google Drive backup will be suspended.
Google Play Service is required for accessing Google Drive.
Import preview media for box art
Daijish≈ç foreground service running. Because background is not supported on your device.
Install, browse, remove and update extensions.
Install extension locally from your device.
Mange your implementations provided by installed extensions.
Show the extensions that aren\'t top level.
